name: Susan Chandler
text:
I have worked out my whole life. Hope the
Owner of Fitness Advantage is one of the very BEST! I look forward to my weekly workouts. Hope inspires, with fun & laughter to do all we can possibly do. She is one amazing woman. The variety of yoga, low impact, weight training,
pilates, & much more keeps us wanting more.

name: Michelle Parr
text: This gym is like no other I have ever been to. It doesn't matter your age or your size the ladies welcome you. It motivates you to workout harder and to be the best you that you can be. I love my gym!!!

name: Mallory Richardson
text: Fitness Advantage is the perfect gym for a woman wanting to get in shape. Hope is amazing and is knowledgeable in all aspects of fitness. Plus, she's a great time! Fitness Advantage isn't just a gym for women, it is an escape for some "me time." Hope and her gym have enabled me to live a healthier lifestyle, and I have also gained a groups of friends that will last a lifetime.

name: Lisa Kowalsky
text: I am so thankful to have been invited by a dear friend to try Fitness Advantage because now I am hooked! Hope's classes are much like having a personal trainer because she leads, instructs, encourages, & pushes us onward! If you want a healthy body it is so important especially as you age to fit regular exercise into your daily routine & Hope makes that very doable!

name: Pam Rennhack
text:
This is a great ladies only gym
Very personal and passionate about helping others
Thank you Hope!!

name: Joyce Edwards
text: I love this ladies fitness workout, yoga, Pilates and many other fun, healthful activities that Hope Richardson can think up to keep you happy and motivated so you have the desire to keep coming back to stay healthy and have more energy.  Thanks for all you do Hope!

name: Amanda Payne
text: Great group of ladies!

name: Lisa Baity
text: I have been going to Fitness Advantage for over three years.  Never miss a MWF class!  Hope Richardson is an amazing gal.  She is a Personal Trainer, a certified Massage Therapist and certified in all the classes she teaches. Fitness Advantage is an all woman's gym and it caters to all things women which is delightful.  There is no judgement only encouragement, a lot of laughs and great exercise.  Hope is a master at her craft and has been in this business 30+ years.  It is the best investment I have ever made for my personal health and well being.  I have a great group of friends from the gym.  This is an establishment that is community minded.  Monthly we help non profits, people in need, teachers with school supplies, animal shelters etc.. Hope is a true believer in her members and the Dothan community!  I encourage you to  join us!

name: Rosemary Millar
text: All ladies! Owner is knowledgeable and helpful and will set up a personal plan just for you.

name: Linda Hays
text: Love working out with this crew!!!

name: Craig Moore
text: I love this course. It was a private club for years. It is now a public course that is owned and maintained by the city park and rec department. Beautiful landscaping. State of the art carts are always charged up. Challenging layout. Multiple tee boxes make it easy for a beginner and challenging for a veteran. Theres even a phone box on the 9th tee box; so you can call the restaurant/bar and put in an order. By the time you finish hole, its a 3 second cart ride to snacks and drinks waiting for you. Very nice locker room in the clubhouse, with built-in, wooden lockers. The Pro shop inside has lots of accessories and clothing for your golf game. On the East side of the course, there is a nice tennis court area with multiple courts. Also has a swimming pool, gym, and fancy locker rooms.

name: madskrillz2
text: I still love this course but they have jacked their prices up WAY too high. I guess that's what happens when you lose money every year. You can go to RTJ and play for 5 dollars cheaper and play on a course  that is at least twice as nice. I still love the layout and their greens. Just can't bring myself to pay nearly 50 dollars for a 30-35ish dollar course.

name: Craig Farris
text: Love the pool

name: Meredith Horst
text: Great sports fields and facilities. Amenities include Walking track,playground,concessions and clean bathrooms. Gardendale soccer club hosts competent and caring coaches. Fun for all the players and families. We enjoy being part of this community.

name: C J K
text: Very nice facilities. My son had a night game there, lighting could be improved, it was kind of hard to see the players from across the field. It almost felt like they only had half the lights on but all were on.

name: Jeremy Pitts
text: Great family fun!!!

name: Jennifer Fivas
text: Such a great field run by the nicest people.  Love that they have concessions available.

name: Jennifer Maddox
text: The best part about it is how friendly people are. It's like one big family and we've always felt welcomed here. The coaches are great and know their stuff!

name: Brit Spy
text: My nephew played soccer here last year and we had such z great experience at his games that we're started our soon this year!

name: Sheila Bryan
text: Great place to watch your grandkids play soccer. Big field, and great food. plenty of parking.

name: Sean Boles
text: Great fields and great people! 👍

name: Patrick Ridgway
text: Great place to play with the kids. Plus there is a playgrounds and a sprinkler park

name: sammy mburu
text: Great atmosphere with great coaches.....

name: Taylor Harris
text: Great time here with everyone. Parents, Coaches, and the Club's staff are wonderful to be around.

name: ALICIA SEARCY
text: It's a great place to walk, run, hike & clear a busy mind.

name: Kasandra Peacock
text: People are friendly and very helpful, fun playground for kids, nice and clean field.

name: Sherry T
text: Great soccer training area

name: Bin Truong
text: Nice fields but it is nothing when you are not allowed to play

name: John Speights
text: Many fields with a long walking track. Also has a playground and splash pad adjacent.

name: Barry Craiger
text: Great park!

name: Steven Coonts
text: Fun for the kids

name: Tim Griffin
text: Nice fields

name: Nena S100
text: Kids love it!!!!!

name: Rick Cooper
text: Nice walking trail. Very well kept.

name: Bethany Patterson
text: Great place to have lunch at picnic tables, then kids can play and everyone can enjoy spending the day together.

name: Tiffany Sefa
text: Nice park.

name: Allison Desiree Blasingame
text: Great walking trail

name: Barry Ikard
text: I walked around 3 times and I was tired

name: Eric Atkins
text: Several acres of play space appropriate for young and old kids.  Our 2 and 4-year-old kids loved the jungle gym which contained multiple slides, climbing walls, swings, and other apparatuses.  There are several covered patios with lots of table tops.  Restrooms are available.  There's a walking trail and plenty of room for dog owners to have fun.  This park rivals some of the parks in the larger city of Huntsville.

name: Rose Hullinger
text: My daughter and I’s Favorite place to walk around after dinner. So peaceful and serene.

name: Martha Carroll
text: Loved it

name: odin of georgia
text: My son and I loved the playground was like a mega toy castle he had a blast

name: Ginger Shaneyfelt
text: I go walking on the walking trail. Very pleasant!

name: Deb Alvarez
text: Very well kept park, lots to do, covered pavilions, restrooms and playground.

name: Bearded Heathen 67
text: Great play ground and walking trai. Several covered palvions that are clean.

name: anthony Parton
text: Nice playground.

name: Karla Little
text: Great playground for the little ones

name: Nancy Turner
text: Could have cleaner bathrooms

name: Bullet1963 bullet1963
text: It is new hope city patk.

name: Kimberly Wilbourn
text: Great place!

name: Shane Parsons
text: Great place

name: Shane Parsons
text: Great place

name: Wanda Jones
text: Well maintain
